hook.text: BJ Fogg wanted to start flossing. He began with one tooth. Just one. Now he flosses all of them daily.

buildup.text: Tiny habits work because they eliminate the resistance that kills motivation before you even start.

discovery.text: The goal isn't the tiny action. The goal is showing up. Once you start, continuing is far easier.

twist.text: Ambitious goals feel exciting at first but create friction. Tiny actions feel boring but create consistency.

climax.text: Make the habit so small it's impossible to fail. Two pushups. One paragraph. Thirty seconds of stretching.

punchline.text: Make it tiny. Make it daily. Let it grow naturally.

quiz.question: Why do tiny habits work better than ambitious goals?
options: They eliminate resistance and build consistency
